channel.title: Custom Requests
channel.description:
I've decided that i'll make models for anyone who requests them on this topic, as usually custom requests are ignored.
I would like to outline some rules that you should read before posting and they are:
[ul][li]No recolour requests[/li] [li]No rs model requests - rs owned models[/li] [li]One request per person at a time - if you overwhelm me with model requests then it will take longer then doing one at a time[/li] [li]I will PM you for further information so be patient[/li] [li]If you don't receive a reply straight away do not attack me - i will get to you[/li] [li]Any model made will be posted here afterward, as it benefits the community[/li] [li]Lastly, you must make your own ints for the models as i am a modeller not a spoon feeder[/li][/ul]
[size=10pt][b]If evidence shows that you did not read the rules before posting, then i will not make the model for you until you do so.[/b][/size]
If you are doubtful about my work, you can look though previous topics of mine. Good luck, and request away. :)
Models:
Frostmourne: [img]http://puu.sh/4UsC4.jpg[/img]
[url=http://puu.sh/4UsJl.rar]Download[/url]
Godz' Request: [img]http://puu.sh/4UmrO.jpg[/img]
[url=http://puu.sh/4UmOd.dat]Download[/url]
Deus Vacui: [img]http://puu.sh/4UsSP.jpg[/img]
[url=http://puu.sh/4UsZ7.rar]Download[/url]
Skull Cutless: [img]http://puu.sh/4Ut6X.jpg[/img]
[url=http://puu.sh/4vmxo.rar]Download[/url]
Link's sword:
[img]http://puu.sh/4WpsZ.jpg[/img]
[url=http://puu.sh/4Wpqf.rar]Download[/url]
Pokeball:
[img]http://puu.sh/4WpBt.jpg[/img]
[url=http://puu.sh/4WpzH.rar]Download[/url]
Help Cape:
[img]http://puu.sh/4WpEH.jpg[/img]
[url=http://puu.sh/4WpFS.rar]Download[/url]
Fancy Dagger/sword:
[img]http://puu.sh/53Gi3.jpg[/img]
[url=http://puu.sh/53Gro.rar]Download contains both sword and dagger models[/url]

item.title: Custom Requests
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb

I’m locking this topic for now, however i will get around to finishing the requested models and distributing them to you all.

item.title: Custom Requests
item.dc:creator: @Ziva Ziva
item.description:
@Ziva wrote:

[quote=“Encryption, post:59, topic:530440”]I’ve brought you renders since they’re much easier to work with.

Here is another side view of the halso sword, I did not use image tags because it was too large.
http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20121117115538/halo/images/8/8e/H4_sword_trans.png

Here is a beautiful dagger.

Here’s a simple pair of nun-chucks.
http://images.halloweencostumes.com/products/13986/1-1/tmnt-michelangelo-nunchucks.jpg[/quote]

why requesting something that already exist? lol…

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Requests
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

amy_webb:

What happened to the one model per person rule? Does nobody read any more?

Sorry, but I was serious about the following. You do not need to copy ever aspect of it. Just get the basic shapes, and add your own textures. That is where your own creativity comes in, I also made these suggestions because I know deeply inside that people would also enjoy my output. You could take how ever long you want, you don’t have to even make them. I just wanted to see if you’d put it into consideration. I’m not asking for myself only, but for others since you make your creations public.

Read full topic

[/quote]

Godz, i’ll message you for more info.

Darkrush, i’ve already sent you a message if you don’t mind replying to it then i could get underway of making the model.

remie, would you like it exactly the same as frostmourne from wow?

Mario, i have no idea what you want from that picture…[/quote]Thanks
